name: Shore Step
summary: The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered.
description: The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered. You ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water. In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on a slippery or wet surface, or on an Athletics check to Swim, you get a critical success instead.
